services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive technology solutions tailored to your business needs
services.webDevDesc: Scalable, high-performance web applications built with modern frameworks like React and Next.js.
services.mobileAppsDesc: Native and cross-platform mobile solutions for iOS and Android that engage users on the go.
services.uiuxDesc: User-centric interfaces and experiences that drive engagement and simplify complexity.
services.cloudDesc: Secure migration, management, and optimization of cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure.
services.securityDesc: Proactive threat monitoring, vulnerability assessments, and enterprise-grade protection.
services.consultingDesc: Strategic technology roadmapping to align your IT investment with business goals.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about ITL Solutions - our mission, values, and the journey that made us a trusted technology partner.
about.heroText: We are a team of passionate technologists dedicated to helping businesses thrive in the digital age. Since 2015, we've been transforming ideas into powerful technology solutions.
about.missionText: Our mission is simple: to empower organizations with innovative IT solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and competitive advantage.
about.journeySubtitle: From a small startup to a global technology partner, here's how we've grown.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do.
about.excellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in every project, delivering solutions that exceed expectations.
about.clientFocusDesc: Our clients success is our success. We build lasting partnerships based on trust and transparency.
about.innovationDesc: We embrace cutting-edge technologies and methodologies to deliver future-proof solutions.
about.ctaSubtitle: We're always looking for new challenges and opportunities to help businesses grow.

timeline.foundedDesc: Started as a small team of passionate developers with a vision to transform businesses through technology.
timeline.firstClientDesc: Partnered with a leading enterprise to deliver a comprehensive digital transformation solution.
timeline.expansionDesc: Opened offices in Europe, serving clients across multiple countries.
timeline.missionDesc: Continuing to improve quality of life through innovative technology solutions that make a real difference.

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to learn more about our services? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.description: Get in touch with ITL Solutions. We're here to help with your technology needs.
contact.helpText: We're here to help and answer any questions you might have. We look forward to hearing from you.

footer.description: Transforming businesses through cutting-edge technology solutions. From cloud infrastructure to custom software development.

privacy.section1Text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you fill out a contact form, request a quote, or communicate with us. This may include your name, email address, phone number, company name, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy.section2Text: We use the information we collect to respond to your inquiries, provide our services, send you technical notices and support messages, and communicate with you about products, services, and events offered by ITL Solutions.
privacy.section3Text: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as necessary to provide our services or as required by law.
privacy.section4Text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section5Text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at

terms.section1Text: By accessing and using the ITL Solutions website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.section2Text: ITL Solutions provides IT consulting, software development, and related technology services. The specific terms of any engagement will be outlined in a separate service agreement.
terms.section3Text: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of ITL Solutions and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.
terms.section4Text: ITL Solutions shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our services or website.
terms.section5Text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at

cookies.section1Text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our site.
cookies.section2Text: We use cookies for essential website functionality, analytics to understand how visitors interact with our website, and to remember your preferences such as language settings.
cookies.section3Text: Essential cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors use our website. Preference cookies remember your settings and choices.
cookies.section4Text: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website.
cookies.section5Text: If you have any questions about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at
